Description.zhCN:
斯雷恩之嗣
远程特种单位。可以使用灵能传送。

可以对地和对空。
Description.enUS:
Sire of Slane
Ranged special unit. Can use teleportation.

Can be used against ground and air.

Description.zhCN: 投射一道快速移动的无敌的灵能投影。死亡使者会在2秒后传送到灵能投影的位置。
Description.enUS: Casts a fast-moving, invincible psychic projection. Deathbringer will teleport to the psychic projection after 2 seconds location.

Description.zhCN:
净化者支援飞船。拥有静滞力场、召回和隐形力场技能。

可以对地和对空。
Description.enUS:
Purifier support ship. Possess stasis field, recall and invisibility field skills.

Can be used against ground and air.

Description.zhCN:
塔达林主力战舰。能够发射轰炸机攻击敌人。

可以对地和对空。
Description.enUS:
Tal'darin main battleship. Able to launch bombers to attack enemies.

Can be used against ground and air.

Description.zhCN:
斯雷恩之嗣
强大的战斗机甲，装备大范围攻击武器。能够攀越悬崖。攻击能在地面上留下火焰，对敌人造成持续性伤害。

可以对地。
Description.enUS:
Sirene's Spawn
A powerful battle mecha equipped with large-area attack weapons. Able to climb over cliffs. The attack leaves flames on the ground, causing continuous damage to enemies.

Can target the ground.

Description.zhCN:
强大的步战机器人，装备高伤害范围攻击武器。能够攀越悬崖。

可以对地和对空。
Description.enUS:
A powerful infantry combat robot equipped with high-damage range attack weapons. Able to climb over cliffs.

Can be used against ground and air.

Description.zhCN:
改良空中优势战机。可使用捕获网技能。

可以对地和对空。
Description.enUS:
Improved air superiority fighter. Can use the Capture Net skill.

Can be used against ground and air.

Description.zhCN:
移动的施法单位。可以使用光子超载、群体召回和时间扭曲技能。可以升级为母舰。

可以对地。
Description.enUS:
Moving spellcasting unit. Can use Photon Overload, Mass Recall and Time Warp skills. Can be upgraded to a mothership.

Can target the ground.

Description.zhCN:
终级塔达林战舰。能够使用引力漩涡、湮灭射线、短途跃迁技能。

可以对地和对空。
侦测单位
Description.enUS:
The ultimate Tal'darim battleship. Able to use gravitational vortex, annihilation ray, and short-distance jump skills.

Can be used against ground and air.
Detection unit

Description.zhCN:
斯雷恩之嗣
空中优势战机。可以使用过载技能。

可以对地和对空。
Description.enUS:
Sirene
Air superiority fighter. Overload skills can be used.

Can be used against ground and air.

Description.zhCN:
神选升格者
范围伤害攻城部队。能够建造并发射金甲虫，造成爆发性伤害。

可以对地。
Description.enUS:
God's Chosen Ascendant
Area damage to siege troops. Ability to build and launch Scarabs, dealing burst damage.

Can target the ground.

Description.zhCN:
神选升格者
多功能对空对地战机。可使用动力过载技能。

可以对地和对空。
Description.enUS:
God's Chosen Ascendant
Multifunctional air-to-ground fighter. Can use power overload skill.

Can be used against ground and air.

Description.zhCN:
主要建筑
用于接收采集到的资源。可以使用时空超速和建筑超载技能。

开启：
- 探机
Description.enUS:
Main building
is used to receive collected resources. Can use space-time super speed and building overload skills.

Open:
- Explorer

Description.zhCN:
塔达林基础工作单位。用于采集资源和折跃塔达林建筑。

可以对地。
Description.enUS:
Tal'darin Basic Work Unit. Used to gather resources and warp Tal'darin buildings.

Can target the ground.

Description.zhCN:
基础建筑
建造在瓦斯气泉上，用于采集高能瓦斯。
Description.enUS:
Basic building
is built on a gas spring and is used to collect high-energy gas.

Description.zhCN:
基础建筑
提供补给。
拥有补给是生产更多单位的前提。
为附近的建筑提供能量。
Description.enUS:
Basic buildings
provide supplies.
Having supplies is a prerequisite for producing more units.
Provides energy to nearby buildings.

Description.zhCN:
生产建筑
折跃塔达林基础地面部队。

开启：
- 狂战士或死徒
- 使探机可以折跃控制芯核
Description.enUS:
Production Building
Warp Tal'darin base ground troops.

Enable:
- Berser or Dead Apostle
- Allows Probe to jump to Control Core

Description.zhCN:
生产建筑
能够使用折跃技术召集塔达林基础地面单位。

开启：
- 狂战士或死徒
- 使探机可以折跃控制芯核
Description.enUS:
Production buildings
are able to summon Tal'darim base ground units using warp technology.

Enable:
- Berser or Dead Apostle
- Allows Probe to jump to Control Core

Description.zhCN:
强大的近战战士，可以使用冲锋和旋风斩技能。

可以对地。
Description.enUS:
A powerful melee warrior who can use charge and whirlwind skills.

Can target the ground.

Description.zhCN:
斯雷恩之嗣
强大的近战战士。可以使用冲锋技能。

可以对地。
Description.enUS:
Sire of Slane
A powerful melee warrior. Can use charge skills.

Can target the ground.

Description.zhCN:
神选升格者
基础远程战士。可以使用牺牲技能。

可以对地。
Description.enUS:
God's Chosen Ascendant
Basic ranged warrior. Sacrifice skills can be used.

Can target the ground.

Description.zhCN:
强大的远程步战机甲，可以使用闪现。

可以对地和对空。
Description.enUS:
A powerful long-range infantry combat mecha that can use flash.

Can be used against ground and air.

Description.zhCN:
斯雷恩之嗣
坚固的远程步战机甲，可以使用闪现。

可以对地和对空。
Description.enUS:
Slaine's Spawn
A sturdy long-range infantry combat mecha that can use Blink.

Can be used against ground and air.

Description.zhCN:
神选升格者
擅长输出的远程步战机甲，可以使用闪现。

可以对地和对空。
Description.enUS:
God's Chosen Ascendant
A long-range infantry mecha that is good at output and can use flash.

Can be used against ground and air.

Description.zhCN:
强大的灵能运用大师。能够使用灵能球、心灵爆裂和献祭技能。

可以对地。
Description.enUS:
A powerful master of psychic abilities. Ability to use Psionic Ball, Psychic Blast, and Immolate skills.

Can target the ground.

Name.enUS: Master who has been promoted through battles

Description.zhCN:
斯雷恩之嗣
更加强大的灵能运用大师。能够使用灵能球、心灵爆裂和献祭技能。

可以对地和对空。
Description.enUS:
Sirane
A more powerful master of psychic abilities. Ability to use Psionic Ball, Psychic Blast, and Immolate skills.

Can be used against ground and air.

Description.zhCN:
恐怖的虚空邪魔。

可以对地和对空。
Description.enUS:
The terrifying void demon.

Can be used against ground and air.

Description.zhCN:
神选升格者
致命的近战杀手，永久隐形。可以使用虚空穿梭和虚空禁锢技能。

可以对地。
Description.enUS:
God's Chosen Ascendant
A deadly melee killer, permanently invisible. Can use void shuttle and void confinement skills.

Can target the ground.

Description.zhCN: 虚空能量团将会在融合完毕后爆炸，对大范围的敌人造成最多300(500 vs 建筑)点伤害。
Description.enUS: The void energy group will explode after fusion, causing up to 300 (500 vs buildings)point damage.

Description.zhCN:
强力机械支援单位。可使用目标锁定、护盾充能、力场、小队视野和角斗者力场技能。

可以对地和对空。
Description.enUS:
Powerful mechanical support unit. Access to Targeting, Shield Charge, Force Field, Squad Vision, and Gladiator Force Field abilities.

Can be used against ground and air.

Description.zhCN:
斯雷恩之嗣
机械支援单位。可使用目标锁定和小队视野技能。

可以对地和对空。
Description.enUS:
Sire of Thrane
Mechanical support unit. Target lock and squad vision skills available.

Can be used against ground and air.

Description.zhCN:
神选升格者
机械支援单位。可以使用护盾充能、力场和角斗者力场技能。

可以对地和对空。
Description.enUS:
God's Chosen Ascendant
Mechanical support unit. Can use Shield Charge, Force Field, and Gladiator Force Field abilities.

Can be used against ground and air.

Description.zhCN:
神选升格者
远程炮击步战机甲。

可以对地和对空。
Description.enUS:
God's Chosen Ascendant
Long-range artillery infantry combat mecha.

Can be used against ground and air.

Description.zhCN:
科技建筑
开启塔达林防御建筑。

开启：
- 使探机可以折跃光子炮台
- 使探机可以折跃护盾充能器
- 使探机可以折跃血晶巨石
Description.enUS:
Technology Building
Open Tal'darin defense building.

Enable:
- Allows Explorer to jump Photon Turret
- Allows Probe to warpShield Charger
- Allows Probe to warphealth Crystal Boulder

Description.zhCN:
科技建筑
开启塔达林高级建筑。

开启：
- 使传送门可以折跃铁骑兵或杀戮者
- 使传送门可以折跃浩劫或扫荡
- 使传送门可以折跃死亡使者或死亡骑士
- 使探机可以折跃死亡议会
- 使探机可以折跃机械台
- 使探机可以折跃星门
Description.enUS:
Technological Building
Opens Tal'darin advanced building.

Enable:
- Enables portal to warp Cavalry or Slayer
- make Portal can jump to Catastrophe or Sweep
- Allows Portal to warp to Deathbringer or Death Knight
- Allows Probe to jump to Death Council c>
- Allows Explorer to jump to Mechanical Platform
- Allows Explorer to jump to Stargate

Description.zhCN:
防御建筑
塔达林主力防御建筑。

可以对地和对空。
侦测单位
Description.enUS:
Defense Building
Tal'darin's main defense building.

Can be used against ground and air.
Detection unit

Description.zhCN:
防御建筑
强大的防御建筑。拥有超高的射程和伤害，但造价昂贵且攻击缓慢。

可以对地和对空。
侦测单位
Description.enUS:
Defense Building
Powerful defensive building. Has super high range and damage, but is expensive and slow to attack.

Can be used against ground and air.
Detection unit

Description.zhCN:
防御建筑
能够为附近的友方单位和建筑恢复护盾。
Description.enUS:
Defense Building
restores shields to nearby friendly units and buildings.

Description.zhCN:
防御建筑
非常强大的防御建筑。拥有超高的射程和伤害。

可以对地和对空。
侦测单位
Description.enUS:
Defense Building
A very powerful defensive building. Has super high range and damage.

Can be used against ground and air.
Detection unit

Description.zhCN:
防御建筑
非常强大的防御建筑。拥有超高的射程和伤害。

可以对地和对空。
侦测单位
Description.enUS:
Defense Building
A very powerful defensive building. Has super high range and damage.

Can be used against ground and air.
Detection unit

Description.zhCN:
生产建筑
折跃塔达林空中部队。

开启：
- 血翼或裂空战机
- 使探机可以折跃舰队航标
Description.enUS:
Production Building
Warp Tal'darim Air Force.

Enable:
- Bloodwing or Spider
- Allows Probe to jumpFleet Beacon

Description.zhCN:
区域打击舰船。可以使用毁灭光束攻击多个目标。

可以对地和对空。
Description.enUS:
Area strike ship. Can use Destruction Beam to attack multiple targets.

Can be used against ground and air.

Description.zhCN:
塔达林攻城炮舰。可从远距离外进行攻击。

可以对地和对空。
Description.enUS:
Tal'darim siege gunboat. Can attack from a distance.

Can be used against ground and air.

Description.zhCN:
科技建筑
开启塔达林进阶科技。

开启：
- 使传送门可以折跃晋升者
- 使传送门可以折跃鲜血猎手
- 使星门可以折跃炼狱毁灭者
- 使星门可以折跃施虐者
- 使探机可以折跃粒子要塞炮
- 使探机可以折跃护盾投射器
- 使探机可以折跃晋升者纪念堂或虚空圣坛

能够合并两个塔达林派系，解锁新单位
Description.enUS:
Technological Building
Unlock Tal'darin's advanced technology.

Enable:
- Enables portal to warp Advanced
- Enables portal to warp Blood Hunter
- Allows Stargate to warp to Infernal Destroyer< /c>
- Makes stargate warpableAbuser
- Allows Probe to warp into Particle Fortress Cannon
- Allows Explorer to warpShield Projector
- Allows Probe to warp Advanced Memorial Hall or Void Altar

Ability to merge two Tal'darim factions, unlocking new units

Description.zhCN:
科技建筑
开启塔达林主力战舰。

开启：
- 使星门可以折跃天霸
- 使星门可以折跃星怒
- 使星灵枢纽可以折跃鲜血王座
Description.enUS:
Technology Building
Open Tal'darin's main battleship.

Open:
- Allows stargate to jump Tianba
- Allows Stargate to jump Starfury
- Allows Protoss Nexus to warp to Throne of Blood< /c>

Description.zhCN:
科技建筑
开启塔达林高级机械部队。

开启：
- 使机械台可以折跃天灾行者或天罚行者
Description.enUS:
Technology Building
Opens Tal'darin's advanced mechanical army.

Enable:
- Enable Mechanical Platform to jump The Walker of Natural Disaster or The Walker of Divine Punishment

Description.zhCN:
科技建筑
开启晋升者特化融合。

开启：
- 使晋升者能够进行拉克希尔
Description.enUS:
Technology Building
Turn on the special fusion of the promoted person.

Enable:
- Enables promoter to Lakhir

Description.zhCN:
生产建筑
折跃塔达林机械部队。

开启：
- 前锋或领主先锋
- 侦测器
- 战争棱镜
- 使探机可以折跃机械研究所
Description.enUS:
Production Building
Warp Tal'darin Mechanical Troops.

Enable:
- Forward or Lord Vanguard
- Detector
- War Prism
- Allows Probe to jump to Mechanical Research Institute< /c>

Description.zhCN:
空中运输单位。可以装载或卸载单位。部署后将生成一个能量场。

可以对地和对空。
Description.enUS:
Air transport unit. Units can be loaded or unloaded. When deployed, an energy field is generated.

Can be used against ground and air.

Description.zhCN: 定点能量供给单位。可以装载或卸载单位。可变形为移动式运输单位。
Description.enUS: Fixed-point energy supply unit. Units can be loaded or unloaded. Can be transformed into a mobile transport unit.

Description.zhCN:
间谍型空中单位。拥有永久隐形的能力。

可以对地和对空。
侦测单位
Description.enUS:
Spy air unit. Possess the ability to become permanently invisible.

Can be used against ground and air.
Detection unit

Description.zhCN:
高输出远程攻击步战机甲。

可以对地和对空。
Description.enUS:
High output long-range attack infantry combat mecha.

Can be used against ground and air.

Description.zhCN:
斯雷恩之嗣
高输出远程攻击步战机甲。

可以对地和对空。
Description.enUS:
Slaine's Son
High output long-range attack infantry combat mecha.

Can be used against ground and air.

Description.zhCN:
神选升格者
前线步战机甲。拥有刚毅护盾，可以使用屏障吸收伤害。

可以对地。
Description.enUS:
God's Chosen Upgraded
Frontline infantry combat mecha. Possessing Fortitude Shield, which can use barriers to absorb damage.

Can target the ground.

Description.zhCN:
科技建筑
开启鲜血猎手特化融合与召唤混合体。可以使用虚空献祭技能。

开启：
- 使鲜血猎手能够融合为虚空能量团
Description.enUS:
Technology Building
Turns on the Blood Hunter's specialized fusion and summoning hybrid. Can use Void Sacrifice skill.

Enable:
- Allows Blood Hunter to fuse into Void Energy Group

Description.zhCN:
基础建筑
建造在瓦斯气泉上，用于采集高能瓦斯。可无需工作单位自动采集高能瓦斯。并提高50%的采集效率。
Description.enUS:
Basic building
is built on a gas spring and is used to collect high-energy gas. High-energy gas can be collected automatically without a working unit. And improve the collection efficiency by 50%.

Description.zhCN: 单位会消耗补给。折跃更多的矩阵节点可以增加补给的数量。
Description.enUS: Units consume supplies. Jumping to more matrix nodes increases the amount of supplies.
